name: Project Sync / Status Update
description: Weekly or bi-weekly project status meeting focusing on milestones and risks.

sections.title: Milestones & Status
sections.instruction: Current milestones with status and estimated completion date

sections.title: Progress Summary
sections.instruction: Short paragraph summarizing progress since last sync meeting

sections.title: Top Risks & Mitigations
sections.instruction: List top risks with impact level, mitigation plan, and owner

sections.title: Key Decisions
sections.instruction: Decisions made in this meeting with rationale and timestamp

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: Tasks with owners, due dates, priority, and status

sections.title: Related Documents
sections.instruction: Links to relevant documents, tickets, or designs discussed
